text: President Donald Trump and first lady Melania Trump in their official Christmas portrait on Dec. 15, 2018, in the Cross Hall of the White House. ( Photo : White House Photo by Andrea Hanks ) President Donald Trump and first lady Melania Trump posed for their 2018 official White House Christmas portrait in a hall crowded with green Christmas trees laden with red ornaments.
